overview: Ashish Mehta is a proven and seasoned business development executive specializing in venture development and strategic market expansion leading successful sales teams at venture and angel-backed firms including IBM, SmartAnalyst Incorporated, Collexis, and NuGenesis Technologies. During his time with the IBM sales team, he gained experience selling consulting services, hardware and software solutions, architecture development, compliance, and design. As a leader at each of these organizations, Ashish became instrumental in their growth, successes and IPOs/acquisitions including closing on a major $180M, seven year outsourcing contract at a CRO. He was elected to a leadership team at Life Science Solutions to develop solutions focused on compliance, clinical trials and electronic data management and was honored with IBM Golden Helix Awards, Bravo Awards and 100% Club Award for outstanding management and leadership. Ashish comes to Landmark after completing his MBA in Finance from the NYU Stern School of Business where he focused his education on courses in entrepreneurship, venture capital, and private equity. Ashish holds a B.S. degree in Bio-Medical Engineering from Boston University and in his personal time enjoys golf, riding his motorcycle, and oil painting, as well as making the occasional donation to friends at his neighborhood poker game.
